title: The most influential bikes of the millennium
content:
Both mountain and road bikes have developed massively in the past five years, let alone the past 21. So we thought it was about time we got together to discuss the most influential bikes since the millennium.

First up, BikeRadar’s MTB tech team, Rob, Tom, Alex and Luke, talk through what they think have been the most influential mountain bikes from super-secretive DH bikes to steel hardtails that defined a genre.

James Huang

Then we chatted with senior technical editor road, Warren, about the most influential road bikes this millennium.

David Caudery / Immediate Media
